trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> types to UI Automation.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> may or may not actually exist in memory.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

The data item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection.
Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> object.

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> is read-only.

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> can be selected.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.
Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
The item in the container after which to begin the search.
The property that contains the value to retrieve.
The value to retrieve.
The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, `null` if no items match.
Scrolls the content area of a container object to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
`true` if the element is selected; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Clears any selected items and then selects the current element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
Gets the UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref> and acts as the container for the calling object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
The provider for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Gets a value that indicates whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`true` if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise, `false`.
Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
